description: Classic reversal setup made of three swing highs: a peak, a higher head, and a lower right shoulder that stalls near the height of the left shoulder. A neckline connecting the swing lows acts as the confirmation level—once broken, momentum is expected to rotate lower as trapped buyers exit.

recognition_rules.candle_structure: Left shoulder advances then pulls back, head prints a higher high, and the right shoulder tops out below the head while volume fades.
recognition_rules.trend_context: Works best after a sustained uptrend or parabolic push where distribution forms along a horizontal neckline.
recognition_rules.volume_confirmation: Look for declining volume across the right shoulder and an expansion on the neckline breakdown.
invalidations: Close back above the right-shoulder swing high after the neckline break
Neckline slopes sharply higher without consolidation

trading_playbook.entry: Trigger on a decisive close below the neckline or on a throwback rejection when price retests the neckline from beneath.
trading_playbook.stop_loss: Defensive stop above the right-shoulder swing high; conservative traders can park above the head.
targets: Measure the vertical distance from head to neckline and project downward from the breakout point
Trail into prior demand zones or round-number magnets
trading_playbook.risk_notes: Choppy ranges dull the edge—prefer clean symmetry between shoulders and a neckline with multiple touches.

statistics.typical_duration: Several weeks on daily charts; shorter on intraday timeframes

description: Bullish continuation pattern where price rounds out a U-shaped basing phase (the cup) followed by a shallow pullback or consolidation (the handle). A break above handle resistance implies trend resumption with trapped shorts forced to cover.

recognition_rules.candle_structure: Cup forms with a smooth rounded bottom; handle drifts lower or sideways no more than one-third of the cup depth.
recognition_rules.trend_context: Preferably emerges after a strong uptrend that pauses for reaccumulation before the next leg higher.
recognition_rules.volume_confirmation: Volume dries up near the cup bottom and handle, then expands on the breakout thrust.
invalidations: Handle retraces more than 50% of the cup advance
Breakdown below the cup lows before the breakout

trading_playbook.entry: Buy the breakout through handle resistance or on a secondary retest that holds above former resistance.
trading_playbook.stop_loss: Place beneath handle lows or, for longer-term structures, under the midpoint of the cup.
targets: Project the cup depth from the breakout level
Use measured moves into prior swing highs or Fibonacci extensions
trading_playbook.risk_notes: Avoid when the handle is extremely steep or volume spikes ahead of the breakout (signs of distribution).

description: Two-candle reversal where a wide real body completely engulfs the prior down candle, signaling an aggressive shift from sellers to buyers. Often marks exhaustion lows or the first step of a swing reversal.

recognition_rules.candle_structure: First candle closes lower with a relatively small real body; second candle opens below (or near) the prior close and pushes above the prior open, engulfing the full body.
recognition_rules.trend_context: Most reliable after a down swing into support or near the tail end of a bearish impulse.
recognition_rules.volume_confirmation: Rising volume or increased tick activity on the engulfing bar strengthens the signal.
invalidations: Close back below the engulfing bar’s midpoint within the next one to two candles
Pattern forms inside congested chop without downward momentum

trading_playbook.entry: Enter on the close of the engulfing bar or on a modest retracement into its midpoint.
trading_playbook.stop_loss: Place below the engulfing candle’s low to respect the invalidation threshold.
targets: Target nearby supply zones or the next pivot high
Trail behind higher swing lows if momentum builds
trading_playbook.risk_notes: Lower reliability when the engulfing candle emerges at resistance or within strong macro downtrends.

description: Bullish continuation pattern with horizontal resistance and rising support trendline. Buyers become increasingly aggressive while sellers hold a consistent level.

recognition_rules.candle_structure: Multiple swing highs cluster near the same horizontal level; swing lows form a rising trendline.
recognition_rules.trend_context: Best after an uptrend where bulls pause to consolidate before next leg.
recognition_rules.volume_confirmation: Volume contracts during consolidation, expands sharply on breakout.
invalidations: Breakdown below rising support trendline
Multiple failed breakout attempts with declining volume

trading_playbook.entry: Enter on decisive close above horizontal resistance or on retest pullback.
trading_playbook.stop_loss: Below most recent swing low or below rising trendline.
targets: Project triangle height from breakout point
Target prior swing highs or measured moves
trading_playbook.risk_notes: False breakouts common at resistance - watch for volume confirmation.

description: Bearish continuation pattern with horizontal support and descending resistance trendline. Sellers become increasingly aggressive while buyers hold a consistent level.

recognition_rules.candle_structure: Multiple swing lows cluster near the same horizontal level; swing highs form a descending trendline.
recognition_rules.trend_context: Best after a downtrend where bears pause to consolidate before next leg.
recognition_rules.volume_confirmation: Volume contracts during consolidation, expands sharply on breakdown.
invalidations: Breakout above descending resistance trendline
Multiple failed breakdown attempts with declining volume

trading_playbook.entry: Enter on decisive close below horizontal support or on retest bounce.
trading_playbook.stop_loss: Above most recent swing high or above descending trendline.
targets: Project triangle height from breakdown point
Target prior swing lows or measured moves
trading_playbook.risk_notes: False breakdowns common at support - watch for volume confirmation.

description: Neutral continuation pattern with converging trendlines. Breakout direction usually follows prior trend.

recognition_rules.candle_structure: Swing highs form descending trendline; swing lows form ascending trendline creating apex.
recognition_rules.trend_context: Can appear in any trend; breakout typically continues prior direction.
recognition_rules.volume_confirmation: Volume declines as triangle narrows, expands on breakout.
invalidations: Price reaches apex without breaking out (indecision)
Weak breakout with no volume follow-through

trading_playbook.entry: Wait for breakout direction, enter on decisive close beyond trendline.
trading_playbook.stop_loss: Opposite side of triangle or below/above most recent swing.
targets: Project widest part of triangle from breakout point
Trend continuation to prior momentum levels
trading_playbook.risk_notes: Risky near apex - prefer entry in first half of triangle formation.

description: Continuation pattern where strong upward move (flagpole) pauses for shallow downward/sideways consolidation (flag) before resuming.

recognition_rules.candle_structure: Sharp advance followed by tight consolidation with parallel descending or sideways boundaries.
recognition_rules.trend_context: Occurs mid-trend in strong uptrends; flag should retrace less than 38% of pole.
recognition_rules.volume_confirmation: Volume dries up during flag formation, surges on breakout.
invalidations: Flag retraces more than 50% of pole
Breakdown below flag support before breakout

trading_playbook.entry: Enter on break above flag resistance or on retest of former resistance.
trading_playbook.stop_loss: Below flag lows or below midpoint of pole.
targets: Project flagpole height from breakout point
Prior swing highs or measured extension
trading_playbook.risk_notes: Avoid when pole lacks strength or market shows divergence.

description: Continuation pattern where strong downward move (flagpole) pauses for shallow upward/sideways consolidation (flag) before resuming.

recognition_rules.candle_structure: Sharp decline followed by tight consolidation with parallel ascending or sideways boundaries.
recognition_rules.trend_context: Occurs mid-trend in strong downtrends; flag should retrace less than 38% of pole.
recognition_rules.volume_confirmation: Volume dries up during flag formation, surges on breakdown.
invalidations: Flag retraces more than 50% of pole
Breakout above flag resistance before breakdown

trading_playbook.entry: Enter on break below flag support or on retest of former support.
trading_playbook.stop_loss: Above flag highs or above midpoint of pole.
targets: Project flagpole height from breakdown point
Prior swing lows or measured extension
trading_playbook.risk_notes: Avoid when pole lacks strength or market shows divergence.

description: Bullish reversal pattern with both support and resistance trendlines sloping downward, converging into apex. Selling pressure weakens as price nears apex.

recognition_rules.candle_structure: Both trendlines slope downward; lower highs and lower lows but rate of descent slowing.
recognition_rules.trend_context: Best at end of downtrend where bears exhaust and bulls prepare to reverse.
recognition_rules.volume_confirmation: Volume decreases during wedge formation, expands on upward breakout.
invalidations: Breakdown below lower wedge trendline
No volume expansion on breakout

trading_playbook.entry: Enter on break above upper wedge trendline or on successful retest.
trading_playbook.stop_loss: Below most recent swing low within wedge.
targets: Project wedge height from breakout point
Return to pre-wedge levels or prior resistance
trading_playbook.risk_notes: Premature entry before breakout risks whipsaw.

description: Bearish reversal pattern with both support and resistance trendlines sloping upward, converging into apex. Buying pressure weakens as price nears apex.

recognition_rules.candle_structure: Both trendlines slope upward; higher highs and higher lows but rate of ascent slowing.
recognition_rules.trend_context: Best at end of uptrend where bulls exhaust and bears prepare to reverse.
recognition_rules.volume_confirmation: Volume decreases during wedge formation, expands on downward breakdown.
invalidations: Breakout above upper wedge trendline
No volume expansion on breakdown

trading_playbook.entry: Enter on break below lower wedge trendline or on successful retest.
trading_playbook.stop_loss: Above most recent swing high within wedge.
targets: Project wedge height from breakdown point
Return to pre-wedge levels or prior support
trading_playbook.risk_notes: Premature entry before breakdown risks whipsaw.

description: Bearish reversal pattern with two peaks at similar price levels separated by moderate trough. Second peak fails to break higher, signaling exhaustion.

recognition_rules.candle_structure: Two swing highs within 2-3% of each other with trough between forming neckline.
recognition_rules.trend_context: Appears after uptrend; second peak shows weakening buying pressure.
recognition_rules.volume_confirmation: Second peak typically shows lower volume than first peak.
invalidations: Close above second peak negates pattern
Neckline holds without breakdown

trading_playbook.entry: Enter on decisive close below neckline or on throwback to neckline.
trading_playbook.stop_loss: Above second peak or above neckline resistance.
targets: Measure height from peak to neckline, project downward from breakdown
Prior support levels or swing lows
trading_playbook.risk_notes: Avoid if peaks are too far apart in time (>3 months) or price levels vary significantly.

statistics.typical_duration: Several weeks to months between peaks

description: Bullish reversal pattern with two troughs at similar price levels separated by moderate peak. Second trough fails to break lower, signaling exhaustion.

recognition_rules.candle_structure: Two swing lows within 2-3% of each other with peak between forming neckline.
recognition_rules.trend_context: Appears after downtrend; second trough shows weakening selling pressure.
recognition_rules.volume_confirmation: Second trough typically shows lower volume than first trough; volume expands on breakout.
invalidations: Close below second trough negates pattern
Neckline holds without breakout

trading_playbook.entry: Enter on decisive close above neckline or on pullback to neckline support.
trading_playbook.stop_loss: Below second trough or below neckline support.
targets: Measure depth from trough to neckline, project upward from breakout
Prior resistance levels or swing highs
trading_playbook.risk_notes: Avoid if troughs are too far apart in time (>3 months) or price levels vary significantly.

statistics.typical_duration: Several weeks to months between troughs
